casebody.data:
Sidney GOODREAUX
v.
LAKEWOOD COUNTRY CLUB a/k/a Lakewood CDD, LLC, New Orleans Fire Fighters Pension Fond Investments a/k/a New Orleans Fire Fighters' Pension and Relief Funds, Lakewood Restoration Partners, Ltd., a Louisiana Limited Liability Partnership a/k/a Devonshire Properties, LLC and Henry Jerome Maumus, III NO. 2017-CC-2043 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 23, 2018 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.
